welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Cabrero, Chile! Known for its stunning natural beauty and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as Delta and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for airlines such as Air Canada and British Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American Airlines and United.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network for up to 45 minutes per session.
